spec_data.Name: colorgcc
spec_data.Description:
Perl script written by Jamie Moyers to colorize the terminal output of C++, CC,
CCACHE, G++, GCC so error messages can be found within longer compiler outputs.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:35:40 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Script to colorize the compiler output
